name: B.U.G.Z
description:
You have landed on an alien planet and the inhabitants doesn't look like you... They have to be eliminated.

The point of the game is to build your base to defend against the growing amount of bugs coming your way. At the end it's either them or you.

-Build, Defend, Kill, Overcome, Exterminate

There are two major modes in the game, the builder and the soldier. The builder gives you full freedom to build towers and nexuses which drains your resource. The soldier has a variety of weapons you can use to push back the horde and earn some additional currency.

The current build contains randomized maps where you can try out the basics of the game with a handful of weapons and buildings in the game. The horde of enemies will attempt to flank you in order to use your weak spot to their advantage. 

We have plans to give a more varied experience by adding a procedurally generated campaign along with more unit, weapons and upgrades which will be released incrementally within the foreseeable future.
